mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO follows (follower_id, followed_id, created_at) VALUES (#{followerId}, #{followedId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follows WHERE follower_id = #{followerId} AND followed_id = #{followedId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follows WHERE follower_id = #{followerId} AND followed_id = #{followedId}

SELECT r.*, u.username as authorName, u.avatar_file_name as authorAvatar FROM recipes r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN follows f ON r.user_id = f.followed_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar_file_name AS avatarFileName FROM users u JOIN follows f ON u.id = f.followed_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{userId}
